comment.author: 7430662@N06
comment._content:
So far my best guess of the signature on the above postcard is "M. Kershaw".

Also of interest I found a very nice postcard with an image Miss Beatrice Kerr
(currently for sale) at "http://www.sportspages.com/swimming/ephemera/general/beatrice_kerr_(champion_australian_swimmer)_1911_27546".

Here is the description of the postcard:
Original postcard. Real photograph of Beatrice Kerr, titled "Champion lady swimmer and diver of Australia." Signed and inscribed "Coo-ee" Yours Sincerely Beatrice Kerr 1911. Postally unused. Inscription and signature in black ink to front. Handwritten annotations in pencil to reverse. In very good condition.
